TopicTitle: Basset Aerospace Innovations - Looking for Modders

Articles.Content:
Toomtoom here.

So, I've been playing since 0.8.1, but just got around to modding.

BAI's mission is to provide you aircraft that aren't of the "Garden Variety".

These aircraft include water bombers and float jets.

I have pics, but can't upload at the moment. will post pics after school.

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>CALLING ALL CODERS, PAINTERS, AND DESIGNERS<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<

I am just one person, and, as such, need help doing things I cannot at the current moment. If you are interested in working with me, please send me a PM.

Any help would be GREATLY appreciated.

Edited May 8, 2013 by toomtoomX
Pics of my first sea plane (WIP still)!

Hey guys, its been about a week since I updated the thread. So, some news.

I am working on a 500-1000 m space carrier, as well as a line of EEPs for quick and (roughly) safe evacuation from spacecraft-in-distress in outer atmosphere.

////////I am in desperate need of people to help me get the models from their raw state to the game as a final product////////

I am looking for anyone with experience, and would greatly appreciate any help or advice. Thank you.

Edited May 18, 2013 by toomtoomX
